name: Don't Stab Your Hand!
description:
Enjoy the classic game of boredom in LCD form: Don't Stab Your Hand! Deftly navigate a knife around your digits, but be sure to not let that knife slip! Features two modes: Classic left-to-right stabbing, and random stabbing. Take a stab at them!

This game was made for Team Dogpit LCD JAM 2019.
